description: Even though he is kind, he is pressured into doing whatever Howard asks because his father works for Howard`s father and Howard threatens to have his father fire Bell`s father. Later thanks to Luna and everyone he stands up to Howard and refuses to obey him. He seems to start developing feelings for Luna, and he tells her during one of the episodes "I will be your family" (episode 40, Finally Arrival), making Kaoru jealous.
name: Bell
